title: Limit Breaker - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Comedy   Harem   Mature   Sci-fi   Seinen

description:
Due to an undiscovered bug in the game Lunatic Don, our protagonist loses both his capsule and all of his data in it. And thus the game company in the form of compensation gives him the latest capsule and also the VIP premium package for all their games.

Now our protagonist sets up his mind to play as a munchkin and starts playing the the latest game Limit Breaker!>
